description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 3x + 4.
comments: n, 3*n+4, 9*n+16 and 27*n+52 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..150000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(3*n+4) and IsPrime(9*n+16) and IsPrime(27*n+52)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
